name: Harvest Pumpkin Brownie and Caramel Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup butter 2 T. light corn syrup
steps: Pour into greased jelly-­‐roll pan (sheet cake pan). Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes.
Melt butter. Stir in sugar and syrup. Boil until sugar is dissolved. Stir in whipping cream and return to a boil.
Add chopped pecans. Serve over vanilla ice cream and Harvest Pumpkin Brownie.
